channel.title: Dupes to patch
channel.description: How know's the most used dupe's i want to patch them. this is server help right?

item.title: Dupes to patch
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:10, topic:505345”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=623574.msg4254272#msg4254272 date=1362492374]

I didn’t understand what you mean

Stop leeching!!!
[/quote]
WTF what stop leeching i just said my source [size=36pt]DONT[/size] have [size=36pt]MUCH CODED IN IT[/size]
And i am using delta…
and who says i have dupes i just want to know them so i can [size=36pt]PATCH THEM ALRIGHTI?[/size][/quote]

If it’s delta it’s not your source. If its a fresh blank copy without any content whats so ever, there’s most likely no dups.
If it’s your content, its your dups, we can point out were you failed at attempting to code because we have NOT seen YOUR code. NOW GO TAKE COMMON SENSE LESSONS FOLLOWED BY BASIC JAVA STUFF TOO!!@@

Read full topic

item.title: Dupes to patch
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

JavaLearner:

He basically says that if you use a source that has been coded well, your chances at having dupes are small. But tbh, every PI source has them, so yea…

So don’t use PI

The major source of all the dupes is people are not verifying the input from the client. They just blindly trust that everything is correct

Read full topic

item.title: Dupes to patch
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

JavaLearner:

Some might already have been patched, others haven’t. Depends on who coded your server and how well they did it. If you find a dupe, make sure to ask for help if you don’t know how to fix it.

This answer is the most reasonable answer you are going to get.
Looking through your code and considering the ‘what if’ scenarios should give you a general idea of what is exploitable, and so would looking around the internet searching things up such as “[REVISION] dupes and glitches.”
Look through the help section as well, and you’ll find quite a bundle of glitches relatable to your private server that you could check and fix.

Read full topic
